评论概述: Cute flowy summer dress, perfect for cruising!
评论详情: I bought this dress for a cruise I am going on.  I think it's a perfect fit for what I wanted.  I am pretty petite and was worried how this dress would fit, but I think it actually flattering.  I paired it with a cute white light weight sweater and white sandals.  The pattern is even prettier in person.  And I love that there is hidden side zipper for ease of getting it on. The dress is also lined.
Beautiful dress. Fits smaller than size says.

评论概述: Why this got low star ratings🤷🏼‍♀️
评论详情: I got a large blue grey floral print and it fit perfect! Nice material, drapes nicely. Chiffon, lined dress. Really cute. I have a big bust so I wasn’t feeling the floral, boat neck fit. I’m more of a vneck girl. But for a summer shin dig.. I would recommend! I’m usually a 12 in a dress. And price point for $40 bucks. 👍🏻

评论概述: Pretty, but probably not for large-chested girlies.
评论详情: Print and color are beautiful. Fabric is lightweight, great for summer, but has very little stretch. The dress fit as expected everywhere except the chest, which was a bit small, so I returned it, but if you aren’t bigger-chested this would likely work well.
Got size L - perfect fit - 5’3, 185lb Lining is nice - Side zipper, a little elastic in the back waist line
I loved the dress but I had ordered a Large and it was medium so I put in new order for same dress but a large
While the color was as picture, the quality of the fabric was “cheap” at best. The seams were not symmetrical. Immediately returned.

The dress is really cute but needs tweaking under the arms it gapes showing bra has a strange fit on top in front it’s cut a little funky and the elastic around the back bunches horizontally and needs a proper  zipper up the back there is no  stretch so it’s a pain to get on I like the dress but the design issues make it look cheap
It fit perfectly except the arm holes were too low and my bra showed through and I had to return.  Easy return and quick refund.
I love this for my granddaughter who’s just in college & teaching a Children’s church class!! It’s beautiful!
I bought this for my daughter, she’s been wearing a women’s xs in most things. Ordered this in a small should have ordered a medium.
At first I thought it was way too small. Then I found the hidden side zipper. Once I got it on it was super cute. Plane to take it for dinners on an upcoming cruise.
The dress flows very nice and the material and color I just love.  Was to baggy in the bust area, having it altered to fit correctly
Elegant dress fits right to size. Love the color and the style.
